fields.text: This is a collection of tools for rough quick financial assessments. It covers a fraction of the US traded shares and a selected number of Russian Eurobonds accessible for purchase at Tinkoff Investments. It also has an ability to approximately estimate portfolio performance using the MPT model (mean-variance analysis).
Oracle Corporation equity Gaz Capital bond INTC,CVX,BRK-B portfolio

1. The asset summary data, financial statements and some technical-analysis data are scheduled for weekly updates during weekends.
  2. Daily prices are scheduled for nightly updates on business days.
  3. The data shown can be imprecise due to using the different sources of the financial data.
The bond data is scheduled for nightly updates

1. The mean and the variance are computed using the daily log-returns of the non-adjusted daily closing prices in a one-year range.
  2. The portfolio points are randomly simulated, the weights are drown from a uniform distribution.
  3. The efficient frontier is computed using the numerical constrained optimisation, a JavaScript implementation of the dual method of Goldfarb and Idnani (1982, 1983) for solving quadratic programming problems.
  4. Daily prices are scheduled for nightly updates on business days.
